task.title: Pausing/resuming replication using UI
task.shortdesc: XDCR replication can be paused and resumed via the web console under the XDCR section.

context.p: DCR streams between the source and destination cluster can be paused (see ) and later resumed. After XDCR is resumed, data continues to replicate between the source and destination clusters starting from where it previously left off.
To pause and resume replication, click the replicating and paused icons under the ongoing replication status.

step.cmd: Under Ongoing Replication > Status, click on the Replicating icon to pause replication.
Under Ongoing Replication > Status, click on the Paused triangle icon to continue replicating.
